description: The International Alliance of Delivery Workers is launching a new coalition called Justice for App Workers. They represent over 10,000 rideshare and delivery gig workers. To kick off their formation, they held a rally in Manhattan. Their demands include; better work conditions, more job security, more benefits, a living wage, and the right to form a union for rideshare and delivery app workers.
author: wynniechan
